src_original: 38. sa adattādānaṃ prahāya adattādānāt prativirato bhavati;  dattādāyī dattarataḥ dattatyaktamuktapratikāṅkṣī astenam alolupaṃ śuddhaṃ śucim ātmānaṃ pariharan anavadyam adattādānāt prativirato (A 509a)  bhavati; sa abrahmacaryaṃ prahāya abrahmacaryāt prativirato bhavati;
tgt_original: adattavastugrahaṇaṁ parityajya sa kevalaṁ dattaṁ vastu gṛhṇāti icchati ca,

src_original: virato maithunād apeto grāmyadharmād abrahmacaryāt prativirato bhavati  39. sa mṛṣāvādaṃ prahāya mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati;
tgt_original: vyabhicāraṁ parihāya sa sampūrṇaśuddhatāyāṁ vasati mithyātvaṁ parityajya sa satyaṁ vadati |

src_original: satyavādī satyarataḥ śraddhitaḥ pratyayitaḥ stheyaḥ avisaṃvādako lokasya mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati;
tgt_original: sa satyavādī,  viśvāsī,  viśvastaḥ san janeṣu vāgbhraṣṭho na bhavati |

src_original: sa na eṣāṃ śrutvā teṣām ārocayati,  teṣāṃ bhedāya;  teṣāṃ vā śrutvā naiṣām ārocayati eṣāṃ bhedāya iti;
tgt_original: apavādaṁ vihāya sa tanna vadati yad ekatra tena śrutaṁ kintu anyatra kalahakāraṇam |
